nodes.text: Pawp was a video store on the planet Coruscant during the Clone Wars. Billboards were put up in order to advertise the business. One particular billboard, written in Aurebesh characters, read "VIDEO STORE" - "PAWP". The business' logo showed the last character upside-down.

Pawp is introduced in the Star Wars: The Clone Wars episode "Sabotage". However, concept art for the show reveals that the business was originally created for the episode "To Catch a Jedi", where Pawp was going to be a pawn shop known as "Pawn".
